name: Frog Town!
description:
What:

Welcome to Frog Town! You play as a frog and get to explore all the wonders of Frog Town! You can go visit the lake... or explore the cliffs... maybe roam the town... This game is very playful and fun for the whole family! No twists here!

Made for Mini Jam 79: Frogs

Controls:

SPACE - Regular jump

LSHIFT + SPACE - Long jump

LMB - Shoot

ESC - Pause menu

How to play:

You have three lives. Every wave there are an additional three enemies. The wave ends when you have killed all the enemies. You get 10 coins every time you kill an enemy. These can be used to purchase upgrades in the main menu. Your also health slowly regenerates. Good luck!

Known Bugs:

The escape button doesn't work for some reason. I'll need to fix that. There's also a few things broken with the enemy AI.

Planned:

Save system! So your progress isn't lost every time you exit the game.
